item.title: The Case for Banning TikTok and Other Socials for Kids Under 16
item.description: The Case for Banning TikTok and Other Socials for Kids Under 16 Social media has become a ubiquitous part of our lives, but it is important to remember that it is not without its risks. In particular, social media can have a negative impact on children’s mental health, well-being, and data privacy.
